      • updateWorker

        public java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Journalist newJournalist)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: HumanRecGateway
        Updates the information about a worker to the system. The journalist with the same ID is replaced by the new one, although it remains author of his pictures, etc.
        Specified by:
        updateWorker in interface HumanRecGateway
        Parameters:
        newJournalist - The new version of the journalist
        Returns:
        Boolean True if and only if the journalist existed in the system before and could be replaced.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • correctNews

        public boolean correctNews(PrintableNews printableNews)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ValidationGateway
        Uploads a revised version of the news, which replaces the old one. The list of reviewers is then cleared (set to empty).
        Specified by:
        correctNews in interface ValidationGateway
        Parameters:
        printableNews - The new version of the news
        Returns:
        True if and only if the operation could be completed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • validateNews

        public boolean validateNews(PrintableNews printableNews,
                            Journalist journalist)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ValidationGateway
        Adds the Journalist jn as reviewer in the PrintableNews pn
        Specified by:
        validateNews in interface ValidationGateway
        Parameters:
        printableNews - The PrintableNews that has been reviewed by the journalist
        journalist - The journalist him/herself
        Returns:
        True if and only if the operation could be completed, the PrintableNews exists, it has not been modified and the journalist was not listed as reviewer already.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.
